description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for Zendesk Ticket Analytics
aboutText:
# Zendesk MCP Server

Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Zendesk Ticket Analytics.

This MCP server enables AI Agents to analyze Zendesk ticket data and provide customer support insights.

## Features

- **Unified ticket search**: Search by keywords, tags, or company filter
- **Company grouping**: Automatically group results by company
- **Ticket links**: Each ticket includes a direct Zendesk URL
- **Ticket details**: Get detailed information about specific tickets
- **Agent performance**: Find top-performing agents by ticket resolution
- **Service trends**: Analyze inquiry frequency by service

## Prerequisites

### Environment Variables

- `ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN` (Required): Your Zendesk subdomain
- `ZENDESK_EMAIL` (Required): Zendesk API user email
- `ZENDESK_API_TOKEN` (Required): Zendesk API token

## Quick Start

```bash
docker run -d \
  --name zendesk-mcp \
  -p 8000:8000 \
  -e ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN=your-subdomain \
  -e ZENDESK_EMAIL=your-email@example.com \
  -e ZENDESK_API_TOKEN=your-api-token \
  public.ecr.aws/saltware/zendesk-mcp:latest
```

## Claude Desktop / Cursor Integration

Add to mcp.json or mcp_settings.json:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "zendesk": {
      "command": "docker",
      "args": [
        "run", "--rm", "-i",
        "-e", "ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN=your-subdomain",
        "-e", "ZENDESK_EMAIL=your-email@example.com",
        "-e", "ZENDESK_API_TOKEN=your-api-token",
        "public.ecr.aws/saltware/zendesk-mcp:latest"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## Available Tools

- **search_tickets**: Unified search with keywords, tags, company filter - returns grouped results with ticket URLs
- **get_ticket_details**: Get detailed ticket information
- **get_top_agents**: Get top agents by ticket resolution count
- **get_service_trends**: Analyze service inquiry trends
usageText:
## Usage

### Docker Run (HTTP Mode)

```bash
docker run -d \
  --name zendesk-mcp \
  -p 8000:8000 \
  -e ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN=your-subdomain \
  -e ZENDESK_EMAIL=your-email@example.com \
  -e ZENDESK_API_TOKEN=your-api-token \
  -e MCP_TRANSPORT=http \
  public.ecr.aws/saltware/zendesk-mcp:latest
```

### Docker Run (STDIO Mode for Claude Desktop)

```bash
docker run --rm -i \
  -e ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN=your-subdomain \
  -e ZENDESK_EMAIL=your-email@example.com \
  -e ZENDESK_API_TOKEN=your-api-token \
  public.ecr.aws/saltware/zendesk-mcp:latest
```

### search_tickets Parameters

| Parameter | Description | Required |
|-----------|-------------|----------|
| keywords | Keyword list (OR search) | One of keywords/tags/company |
| tags | Tag filter | One of keywords/tags/company |
| company | Company name filter | One of keywords/tags/company |
| status | Status filter (open/pending/hold/solved/closed) | No |
| period_days | Search period in days (default: 90) | No |
| limit | Max tickets (default: 500) | No |

### Environment Variables

| Variable | Description | Required |
|----------|-------------|----------|
| ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN | Zendesk subdomain | Yes |
| ZENDESK_EMAIL | API user email | Yes |
| ZENDESK_API_TOKEN | API token | Yes |
| MCP_HOST | Server host (default: 0.0.0.0) | No |
| MCP_PORT | Server port (default: 8000) | No |
